CustomField.description: Automatically applies matching criteria-based approvers when entering the approval phase. If the phase auto-submits into approval, there is no way to remove approver groups during approval. Uncheck Auto-apply, to manually and optionally apply the suggested approvers for this rule.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically applies matching criteria-based approvers when entering the approval phase. If the phase auto-submits into approval, there is no way to remove approver groups during approval. Uncheck Auto-apply, to manually and optionally apply the suggeste
CustomField.label: Auto Apply CBA
